content:
During the 2022-02-01 Financial Management Workgroup call we plan to introduce the following tickets and resolutions for Block-Vote-1 to be voted on the following week:
(Some are technical corrections that do not require a vote but are included for purposes of review)

FHIR-34669 - Correct spelling of DRG in Inpatient Institutional Notes on Fields
FHIR-34457 - Add short Descriptions to sliced supportingInfo elements in Pharmacy EoB
FHIR-34513 - Comparison of EOB Types Needs to be Updated to Include Oral EOB
FHIR-35210 - Update not updated to reflect the new profiles.
FHIR-34608 - EOB - Oral offical URL does not resolve
FHIR-34783 - Remove Notes for item.revenue
FHIR-35211 - Update figure header
FHIR-35359 - Review and update background
FHIR-35720 - language confusing
FHIR-35722 - Include link to the ONC Model Privacy notice
FHIR-35723 - suggest revision
FHIR-35724 - revise language
FHIR-34516 - FSH-like annotation of examples missing from new oral examples
FHIR-34514 - FSH-like annotation of examples missing from new oral examples
FHIR-35450 - Notes on fields for the Oral EOB profile contains errors which need to be corrected.
Who are the submitters? (Should do an '@' notify for those individuals)
@MaryKay McDaniel @Paul Knapp @Celine A Lefebvre @Josh Mandel @Eric Haas @Saul Kravitz

As per the discussion on the 2022-02-01 Financial Management Workgroup call we are proposing the following block vote to be voted on 2022-02-08 Block-Vote-1 :
(Technical corrections were removed from the original list)

FHIR-34513 - Comparison of EOB Types Needs to be Updated to Include Oral EOB
FHIR-34608 - EOB - Oral offical URL does not resolve
FHIR-34783 - Remove Notes for item.revenue
FHIR-35211 - Update figure header
FHIR-35359 - Review and update background
FHIR-35720 - language confusing
FHIR-35722 - Include link to the ONC Model Privacy notice
FHIR-35723 - suggest revision
FHIR-35724 - revise language
FHIR-34516 - FSH-like annotation of examples missing from new oral examples
FHIR-34514 - FSH-like annotation of examples missing from new oral examples
FHIR-35450 - Notes on fields for the Oral EOB profile contains errors which need to be corrected.

The below tickets were pulled out of the block vote, as they are Technical Corrections (which are available to review if you so wish).
FHIR-34669 - Correct spelling of DRG in Inpatient Institutional Notes on Fields
FHIR-34457 - Add short Descriptions to sliced supportingInfo elements in Pharmacy EoB
FHIR-35210 - Update not updated to reflect the new profiles.

The CARIN BB Block Vote 1 was not addressed during the 2022-02-08 FM meeting. It has been requested as a top agenda item for the 2022-02-15 FM Meeting.

FHIR-35724 Persuasive revise language Celine A Lefebvre
FHIR-35723 Persuasive with Modification suggest revision Celine Lefebvre
FHIR-35722 Persuasive with Modification Include link to the ONC Model Privacy notice Celine Lefebvre
FHIR-35720 Persuasive language confusing Celine Lefebvre
FHIR-35450 Persuasive with Modification Notes on fields for the Oral EOB profile contains errors which need to be corrected. Paul Knapp
FHIR-35359 Persuasive with Modification Review and update background Josh Mandel
FHIR-35211 Persuasive with Modification Update figure header Mary Kay McDaniel
FHIR-34783 Persuasive Remove Notes for item.revenue Eric Haas
FHIR-34608 Not Persuasive EOB - Oral offical URL does not resolve James Threatte
FHIR-34516 Persuasive with Modification FSH-like annotation of examples missing from new oral examples Saul Kravitz
FHIR-34514 Persuasive FSH-like annotation of examples missing from new oral examples Saul Kravitz
FHIR-34513 Persuasive with Modification Comparison of EOB Types Needs to be Updated to Include Oral EOB Saul Kravitz

@Celine A Lefebvre @Saul Kravitz @Paul Knapp @Josh Mandel @MaryKay McDaniel @Eric Haas

During that meeting, we also plan on proposing Block-Vote-2 for voting on 2022-02-22 (Tickets and resolutions to be presented before the meeting).

The above is being sent to the FM list serve
